name: Sweet Love - Otome Romance
summary:
"In Sweet Love: Highschool Life, live the daily life of a schoolgirl freshly landed at Sweet Amoris.A new high school, a new city, new friends ... or even more! You will meet colorful boys, with each one his particular traits, will you be bad boy, first class or geek? 
 
In Campus Life, juggle between the courses in college and your little job. So many places to meet the person of your dreams! Your adorable colleague, the lost rockstar, your former classmate, or even a forbidden romance ... so many profiles with different characters and stories! "
